ariadne/
display.rs

1use std::fmt::{self, Display};
2
3#[derive(Copy, Clone, Debug)]
4pub struct Show<T>(pub T);
5
6impl<T: Display> Display for Show<Option<T>> {
7    fn fmt(&self, f: &mut fmt::Formatter) -> fmt::Result {
8        match &self.0 {
9            Some(x) => write!(f, "{}", x),
10            None => Ok(()),
11        }
12    }
13}
14
15impl<'a, T, F: Fn(&mut fmt::Formatter, &'a T) -> fmt::Result> Display for Show<(&'a [T], F)> {
16    fn fmt(&self, f: &mut fmt::Formatter) -> fmt::Result {
17        for x in self.0 .0 {
18            (self.0 .1)(f, x)?;
19        }
20        Ok(())
21    }
22}
23
24impl<T: Display> Display for Show<(T, usize)> {
25    fn fmt(&self, f: &mut fmt::Formatter) -> fmt::Result {
26        for _ in 0..self.0 .1 {
27            write!(f, "{}", self.0 .0)?;
28        }
29        Ok(())
30    }
31}
